info.title: Trisog Travels API
info.description: This is the API for managing tours, categories, and reviews. It provides endpoints for user authentication, tour management, and retrieving information about destinations and activities.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all countries.

post.description: Create a new country with the provided details.

get.description: Retrieve a list of countries grouped by continent.

200.description: A list of countries grouped by continent

put.description: Update details of an existing country identified by the provided ID. You can update the countryâ€™s name or image URL.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the country to update

requestBody.description: Country object with fields to be updated

delete.description: Delete an existing country identified by the provided ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the country to delete

get.description: Get all the destinations available in the database, including their IDs, countries, and cities.

post.description: Creates a new destination in the database with the specified country and city.

country.description: ID of the country where the destination is located

400.description: Invalid input or error in creating destination

put.description: Updates the details of an existing destination by its ID. You can update the country or city fields.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the destination to update

country.description: ID of the new country for the destination

city.description: Name of the new city for the destination

400.description: Invalid input or error in updating destination

delete.description: Deletes a destination by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the destination to delete

400.description: Invalid ID or error in deleting destination

get.description: Retrieve a list of all reviews with detailed information.

comment.example: Amazing tour! The guide was very knowledgeable, and the locations were breathtaking.

post.description: Submit a new review for a tour in the system.

comment.example: Amazing tour! The guide was very knowledgeable, and the locations were breathtaking.
Amazing tour! The guide was very knowledgeable, and the locations were breathtaking.

put.description: Update the details of an existing review by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the review to be updated.

comment.example: Amazing tour! The guide was very knowledgeable, and the locations were breathtaking.
Amazing tour! The guide was very knowledgeable, and the locations were breathtaking.

error.example: Review with the given ID not found

delete.description: Delete a review by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the review to be deleted.

comment.example: Amazing tour! The guide was very knowledgeable, and the locations were breathtaking.

error.example: Review with the given ID not found

get.summary: Retrieve average ratings for a specific tour
get.description: Retrieve average ratings for services, prices, locations, food, amenities, and room comfort quality for a specific tour identified by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the tour for which to retrieve average ratings.

error.example: Tour with the given ID not found

get.summary: Retrieve reviews for a specific tour
get.description: Retrieve all reviews for a specific tour identified by its ID, including details like review date, reviewer's name, average rating, comment, and the count of reviews by the user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the tour for which to retrieve reviews.

200.description: Successfully retrieved reviews for the specified tour

comment.example: Amazing tour! The guide was very knowledgeable, and the locations were breathtaking.

error.example: Tour with the given ID not found

get.description: Retrieve a list of all available tours.

overview.example: An exciting adventure in the heart of New York.

post.description: Register a new tour with the provided details.

overview.example: An exciting adventure in the heart of New York.
An exciting adventure in the heart of New York.

put.description: Update an existing tour with the provided details. Only the fields included in the request will be updated.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the tour to update

overview.example: An exciting adventure in the heart of New York.
An exciting adventure in the heart of New York.

delete.description: Delete a specific tour by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the tour to delete

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific tour by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the tour to retrieve

overview.example: An exciting adventure in the heart of New York.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of tours with optional filters and sorting.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of tours per page

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of categories to filter by

parameters.name: destinations
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of destinations to filter by

parameters.name: rating
parameters.description: Minimum rating to filter by

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter tours by name or description

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: Minimum price to filter by

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date to filter tours by

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort the tours by

overview.example: An exciting adventure in the heart of New York.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all types of tours.

post.description: Register a new type of tour in the system.

error.example: Type with the same name already exists

put.description: Update the details of an existing type by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the type to be updated.

error.example: Type with the given ID not found

delete.description: Delete a type by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the type to be deleted.

error.example: Type with the given ID not found
